Name: Garry's Mod
Author: FlashModz
InstallScript:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'debian:buster-slim'
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates zip unzip

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi
FIRST_ISSUE_VISUAL="232250"
FIRST_ISSUE_VISUAL_DIR="/mnt/server/content/tf2"
MAINTAINER="flashmodz"
PVERSION="1.0.1"


## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd 
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit

## install game using steamcmd (Commented because too old and not optimised for linux)
## ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## Install other source needed (Potentiel visual issues)
## ./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir ${FIRST_ISSUE_VISUAL_DIR} +app_update ${FIRST_ISSUE_VISUAL} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

if [ -d /mnt/server/content/css/css-content-gmodcontent ]; then
    echo "Content exist - Ignore it now"
else
    mkdir /mnt/server/content/
    mkdir /mnt/server/content/css/
    cd /mnt/server/content/css/
    curl -sSL -o css.zip https://zdev.fr/dl-jeuxeggs/css-content-gmodcontent.zip
    unzip css.zip -d /mnt/server/content/css/
    rm -f css.zip
fi

if [ -d /mnt/server/content/tf2/materials ]; then
    echo "Content exist - Ignore it now"
else
    mkdir /mnt/server/content/tf2/
    cd /mnt/server/content/tf2/
    curl -sSL -o tf2.zip https://zdev.fr/dl-jeuxeggs/tf2-content-gmodcontent.zip
    unzip tf2.zip -d /mnt/server/content/tf2/
    rm -f tf2.zip
fi

if [ -d /mnt/server/garrysmod/gamemodes/darkrp/ ]; then
    echo "Gamemode exist - Ignore it now"
else
    cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/gamemodes/
    curl -sSL -o darkrp.zip https://github.com/FPtje/DarkRP/archive/refs/heads/master.zip
    unzip darkrp.zip -d /mnt/server/garrysmod/gamemodes
    rm -f darkrp.zip
    mv DarkRP-master darkrp
fi

# Creating needed default files for the game
cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/lua/autorun/server
echo '
-- Docs: https://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/resource/AddWorkshop
-- Place the ID of the workshop addon you want to be downloaded to people who join your server, not the collection ID
-- Use https://beta.configcreator.com/create/gmod/resources.lua to easily create a list based on your collection ID

-- This is the DarkRP WorkShop ID
-- resource.AddWorkshop( "248302805" )

resource.AddWorkshop( "" )
' > workshop.lua

cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/cfg
echo '

//
// Use this file to mount additional paths to the filesystem
// The folder you provide must contain either one or more *_dir.vpk files or the usual models/materials/etc folders
// Lines starting with // are comments and are ignored by the game
// This file will also affect Hammer Editor (hammer.exe)
//

// DO NOT add a slash to the end of the filename
// DO NOT start lines with // in between { and }, the 2 lines there are commented out examples and will be ignored by the game

"mountcfg"
{
"cstrike"	"/home/container/content/css/css-content-gmodcontent/"
"tf"		"/home/container/content/tf2"
}

// DO NOT start lines with // in between { and }, the 2 lines there are commented out examples and will be ignored by the game
' > mount.cfg

cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/cfg
echo '
// Please do not set RCon in here, use the startup parameters.

// Base Configuration
hostname "FR Host by GameHostfr"
sv_password "mySecurePwd"
rcon_password "myRcOnPwdSecure"

// Network Configuration
sv_downloadurl ""
sv_allowdownload 1
sv_allowupload 0
net_maxfilesize 2048
sv_loadingurl   ""
sv_minrate		75000
sv_maxrate		0
gmod_physiterations	2
net_splitpacket_maxrate	45000
decalfrequency		12

// Logging Configuration
log on
sv_logbans 1
sv_logecho 0
sv_logfile 1
sv_log_onefile 0

// Steam Server List Settings
sv_region "3"
sv_location "fr"
sv_lan "0"
sv_max_queries_sec_global "30000"
sv_max_queries_window "45"
sv_max_queries_sec "5"

// Server Configuration
sbox_noclip 0
sbox_godmode 0
sbox_playershurtplayers 1
sbox_maxprops 64
sbox_maxragdolls 32
sbox_maxnpcs 0
sbox_maxballoons 5
sbox_maxeffects 5
sbox_maxdynamite 0
sbox_maxlamps 10
sbox_maxthrusters 0
sbox_maxwheels 0
sbox_maxhoverballs 0
sbox_maxvehicles 0
sbox_maxbuttons 4
sbox_maxemitters 4

// Execute Ban Files - Please do not edit
exec banned_ip.cfg
exec banned_user.cfg

// Add custom lines under here
' > server.cfg

## chmod -R 750 /mnt/server/

echo ".###################################."
echo ".#      Install complete"
echo -e ".#      Maintainer : ${MAINTAINER}"
echo ".###################################."
echo -e "install complete with version : ${PVERSION}"

Variables.Description: Define the map for your server
You need to write your API, you can create one on : https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers
Insert all ID from the workshop you want. ID separated by comma.
Set the desired tickrate you want for your server
Do you allow the refresh LUA during your server is in running state ?
